metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3044 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Linux kernel component in IBM PowerKVM 2.1 before 2.1.1.3-65.10 and 3.1before 3.1.0.2 allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OSinfinite loop and hang) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.19.0-59-generic - 3.19.0-59.65~14.04.1
linux-image-3.19.0-59-generic-lpae - 3.19.0-59.65~14.04.1
